name: Chatpiper wordpress
author: WhiteCity Code

sections.description:
This is just the extension to enable the app, NOT the app itself. For details on the app/buying the app: https://www.chatpiper.com/

ChatPiper is a chat system that is installed on your own server.
sections.installation:
1. From https://chatpiper.com download and install on your own server ChatPiper
  2. Upload plugin-name.zip to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  3. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  4. In wordpress at the ChatPiper’s section enter the URL to the aplication on your server.

short_description: This is just the extension to enable the app, NOT the app itself.
